template_content:
Certificate of Excellence


Awarded to


%FULL_NAME%


For demonstrating exceptional skills in


%QUIZ_NAME%


Awarded on: %DATE_TAKEN%
template_css: .qsm-certificate-templ-container-2 {text-align: center; font-family: 'Georgia', serif;} .qsm-certificate-templ-2 {padding: 15pt; height: 225pt;} .certificate-title {font-size: 37.5pt !important; padding: 0 !important; margin: 0; font-weight: bold; background: linear-gradient(to right, #1e3c72, #2a5298); -webkit-background-clip: text;} .certificate-subtitle {font-size: 15pt; linear-gradient(to right, #1e3c72, #2a5298); -webkit-background-clip: text; margin: 11.25pt 0;} .recipient-name {font-size: 27pt; margin: 7.5pt 0; color: #daa520; font-style: italic; font-weight: bold;} .achievement-text {font-size: 15pt !important; linear-gradient(to right, #1e3c72, #2a5298); -webkit-background-clip: text; margin: 0;} .achievement-category {font-size: 18pt !important; font-weight: bold; color: #daa520;} .award-date {font-size: 13.5pt; linear-gradient(to right, #1e3c72, #2a5298); -webkit-background-clip: text; text-align: left; margin-left: 60pt; margin-top: 52.5pt;} .award-date-highlight {font-weight: bold; color: #daa520;}

template_content:
Certificate of Excellence


Awarded to


%FULL_NAME%



This certificate is awarded in recognition of outstanding dedication, effort, and achievement. Your hard work and perseverance have led to this well-deserved success. We celebrate your commitment to excellence and congratulate you on this remarkable accomplishment.


Awarded on: %DATE_TAKEN%
template_css: .qsm-certificate-templ-container-2 {text-align: center; font-family: 'Georgia', serif; height: 225pt;} .qsm-certificate-templ-2 {padding: 15pt; height: 225pt;} .certificate-title {font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; font-size: 37.5pt !important; padding: 0 !important; margin: 0; font-weight: bold; background: linear-gradient(to right, #1e3c72, #2a5298); -webkit-background-clip: text;} .reciptent-dashline{border: 1.5pt solid #135e96; width: 80%;} .certificate-subtitle {font-size: 22.5pt !important; linear-gradient(to right, #1e3c72, #2a5298); -webkit-background-clip: text; margin: 11.25pt 0;} .recipient-name {font-size: 27pt; margin: 7.5pt 0; color: ##353044; font-weight: bold;} .achievement-text {font-size: 15pt !important; linear-gradient(to right, #1e3c72, #2a5298); -webkit-background-clip: text; width: 360pt; margin: auto; margin-top: 11.25pt;} .award-date {font-size: 13.5pt; linear-gradient(to right, #1e3c72, #2a5298); -webkit-background-clip: text; text-align: right; margin-top: 131.25pt;} .award-date-highlight {font-weight: bold; color: #353044;}

template_content:
CERTIFICATE OF APPRECIATION



This is to certify that


%FULL_NAME%


Your enthusiasm, effort, and dedication have been truly inspiring. This achievement reflects your commitment to learning and growth. Keep striving for excellence in all your future endeavors!


Awarded on: %DATE_TAKEN%
template_css: .qsm-certificate-templ-container-3 {text-align: right; font-family: 'sans-serif'; margin-right: 30pt; height: 225pt;} .qsm-certificate-templ-3 {padding: 15pt;} .reciptent-dashline{border: 1.5pt solid #D99156; width: 60%; margin-left: 41%; margin-top: -7.5pt; } .certificate-title {font-family: 'sans-serif'; font-size: 22.5pt !important; margin: 0; color: #121212; font-weight: bold;} .certificate-subtitle {font-family: 'sans-serif'; font-size: 16.5pt !important; color: #333; margin: 7.5pt 0;} .recipient-name {font-family: Edwardian Script ITC; font-size: 45pt; margin: 7.5pt 0; color: #121212; font-style: italic;} .achievement-text {font-size: 15pt; color: #555; margin: 11.25pt 0; margin-left: 41%; text-align: right;} .award-date { font-family: 'sans-serif'; font-size: 12pt; color: #121212; } .award-date-highlight {font-weight: bold; color: #121212;}

template_css: .qsm-certificate-templ-container-2 {text-align: center; font-family: 'Georgia', serif; height: 225pt;} .qsm-certificate-templ-2 {padding: 15pt; height: 225pt;} .certificate-title {font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; font-size: 37.5pt !important; padding: 0 !important; margin: 0; font-weight: bold !important; color: brown;} .reciptent-dashline{border: 1.5pt solid #135e96; width: 80%;} .certificate-subtitle {font-size: 22.5pt !important; linear-gradient(to right, #1e3c72, #2a5298); -webkit-background-clip: text; margin: 11.25pt 0;} .recipient-name {font-size: 27pt; margin: 7.5pt 0; color: brown; font-weight: bold;} .achievement-text {font-size: 15pt !important; linear-gradient(to right, #1e3c72, #2a5298); -webkit-background-clip: text; width: 360pt; margin: auto; margin-top: 11.25pt;} .award-date {font-size: 13.5pt; linear-gradient(to right, #1e3c72, #2a5298); -webkit-background-clip: text; text-align: left; margin-top: 112.5pt;} .award-date-highlight {font-weight: bold; color: brown;}

template_content:

template_css: .qsm-certificate-templ-container-4 {text-align: center; font-family: 'Bahnschrift'; height: 225pt;} .qsm-certificate-templ-4 {padding: 15pt; margin-top: 7.5pt;} .certificate-title {font-size: 30pt; margin: 0; color: #2C3E50; font-weight: bold;} .certificate-subtitle {font-size: 18.75pt; color: #4a4a4a; margin: 0;} .reciptent-dashline{border: 1.5pt solid #D99156; width: 60%; margin-top: -18.75pt; } .recipient-name {font-size: 22.5pt; margin-top: 22.5pt; color: #00A8B5; font-style: italic;} .achievement-text {font-size: 15pt; color: #555; margin: 7.5pt 0;} .award-date {font-size: 13.5pt; text-align: left; margin-left: 45pt; margin-top: 48.75pt;} .award-date-highlight {font-weight: bold; color: #2C3E50;}

template_css: .qsm-certificate-templ-container-4 {text-align: center; font-family: math; height: 225pt;} .reciptent-dashline{border: 1.5pt solid #f7002b; width: 15pt; margin-top: -30pt; } .qsm-certificate-templ-4 {padding: 15pt; margin: 0pt;} .certificate-title {font-size: 52.5pt !important; margin: 0; padding: 0 !important; line-height: 0 !important; color: #2c3e50; font-weight: bold;} .certificate-subtitle {font-size: 22.5pt !important; color: #4a4a4a; margin: 11.25pt 0; font-family: math;} .recipient-name {font-family: math; font-size: 30pt; margin: 7.5pt 0; color: #d63638; } .achievement-text {font-family: math; font-size: 15pt; color: #555; margin: 15pt 0; width: 375pt; margin: auto;} .award-date {font-family: math; font-size: 15pt; text-align: right; color: #555; margin-top: 37.5pt;} .award-date-highlight {font-weight: bold; color: #d63638;}
